SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.glassfish.hk2.api
Annotation Type PerThread

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Scope
@Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
public @interface PerThread

PerThread is a scope that operates like Singleton scope, except on a per-thread basis. The lifecycle of the service is determined by the thread it is on. On a single thread only one of the service will be created, but a new service will be created for each thread.

The PerThread scope is not automatically handled by a new ServiceLocator. In order to enable the PerThread scope the user can either add an implementation of Context which handles it or it can use the ServiceLocatorUtilities#enablePerThreadScope method.

Author:
jwells
